original_text: So then, Christian friends, we see that Jesus died as a sacrifice on our behalf. Because of that, we may go into God's Most Holy Place. We are not afraid to do that. So then, Christian friends, we see that Jesus died as a sacrifice on our behalf. Because of that, we may go into God's Most Holy Place. We are not afraid to do that. So then, Christian friends, we see that Jesus died as a sacrifice on our behalf. Because of that, we may go into God's Most Holy Place. We are not afraid to do that.
korean_text: 그러므로 형제들아 우리가 예수의 피를 힘입어 성소에 들어갈 담력을 얻었나니

sentences.original_text: So then, Christian friends, we see
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로, 기독교 친구들이여, 우리는 보고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that Jesus died as a sacrifice
Because of that, we may go
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때문에, 우리는 들어갈 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We are not afraid to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그렇게 하는 것을 두려워하지 않습니다
